title: Unbearable Teamates
body:
What can I do in this situation?

It's ranked , and I get players who aint serious about playing the game. One in particular bot laner decided to follow me around the jungler throwing my red and blue buff away so its health regens preventing me for 5 minutes from taking my first camp. Is there anyway that gets these players banned I seem to report them and nothing happens.

replies.body:
Gameplay punishments are slower than anyone would like, and it comes down to a confidence thing (i.e not wanting to ban players for just being bad).

Players that pull this kind of crap *do* get punished, but unfortunately there just isn't much feedback for the players they affect.

The best thing you can do in this scenario is report them. If they're pulling behaviour that's a little sneakier then you can also submit a report ticket to Player Support to make sure it's getting noticed, either by the automated system or manually: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Fair warning, support can't and won't give you *any* information, explicit or otherwise, about another player's account, so you'll get a generic "thanks for your report, we'll look into it" type response. It doesn't mean it hasn't been looked into, just that they are limited in what information they can give you.

The best way to get away from the trash, is to get above wood 5.
But you can't get out of wood 5 because of all the trash.

Hmmmmmmm.......
This is my first season, so yeah I'm going to have to improve to get out.  My a call of duty player originally so this style of game is really new to me, which makes it hard to climb.
